title: Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate (Love, Election and Chocolate)
synopsis: Yuuki Oojima is a member of his high school's Food Research Club, whose main activity is eating snacks bought with funds allocated to them by the school. However, this peaceful and wasteful lifestyle is under threat as the upcoming student election draws near. Satsuki Shinonome, a major candidate and the head of the department of financial affairs, campaigns on a platform that includes disbanding meritless clubs such as the Food Research Club and redirecting their budgets to proper ones.
related_anime: ['Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate', 'Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate: Koi Imouto!', 'Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate: Ikenai Hazuki-sensei']
